Did you know that in Starbucks they can remove your personal belonging and dump it in a plastic bag if you leave your seat for 15 min or more. First time I went there to study today and they did that when I went to the toilet. When I came back people were sitting at my table and all my personal belonging including my unfinished drink was remove . Its so callous and disrespectful of others when they can just trash your thing as they please.  If there is no space wait for people to return and ask politely if they could release their seats but even then most fast food including McDonalds, KFC and most restaurant do not bother their paying customers to move out of their table and if there is no seat people will just go somewhere but not Starbuck.  They have every rights to dump your stuff including unfinished coffee and kick you out of your table.
